column2: The wand will consume soul instead of mana [60/soul]. Hit enemies will grant 1 soul.
Kick this item to deploy a Soul Reservoir above you.\n[Soul Reservoir: The heart of a soul system]
Kick this item to deploy a Soul Charger above you.\n[Soul Charger: Charge engine spells with soul from your reservoir]
Kick this item to deploy a Sludge Machine above you.\n[Sludge Machine: Turns toxic sludge into soul]
Kick this item to deploy a Fabricator above you.\n[Fabricator: Assemble soul contraptions]
Kick this item to deploy an Accelerator above you.\n[Accelerator: Uses soul to accelerate whatever is above it]
